text: The Mozambique national futsal team, nicknamed Os Mambas, represents Mozambique in international and African futsal competitions. It is affiliated to the Mozambican Football Federation. ==Tournament records== : *Denotes draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. : **Gold background color indicates that the tournament was won. : ***Red border color indicates tournament was held on home soil. ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%;" !colspan=9|FIFA World
